WorkItem.Description:
When adding an extra gem for belt buckle, any existing gemming socket bonus appears grayed out.  Workaround is to modify the Socket# requirement to whatever color you provided as the belt buckle gem.  For example, 
 
Jorach's Crocolisk Skin Belt (Loaded from Armory Profile) with Belt Buckle
Socket#1 Blue
Socket#2 None
Gem#1 Perfect Sovereign Shadow Crystal
Gem#2 Bold Scarlet Ruby
 
Result: No 4 Agility socket bonus
 
Workaround example:
Jorach's Crocolisk Skin Belt with Belt Buckle
Socket#1 Blue
Socket#2 Red
Gem#1 Perfect Sovereign Shadow Crystal
Gem#2 Bold Scarlet Ruby
WorkItem.Summary: Adding belt buckle gem to item invalidates socket bonus
